description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for one (1) Senior Procurement Specialist with procurement, Contracting, and Capital Procurement expertise to assist with the more complex files that are now within DLP 8's delegation.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement:** Procurement Specialist
=====================================

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** cb-326-38578547
* **Solicitation Number:** W6399-24-LP73/A
* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-18
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-05T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-04-05

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for a Senior Procurement Specialist to assist with complex procurement files under DLP 8's delegation. The successful candidate will possess expertise in procurement, contracting, and capital procurement.

### Notice Type and Procurement Method

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contracting Entity

* **Department of National Defence (DND)**
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Angelina Costain
	+ Email: Angelina.Costain@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (613) 990-4939

### Tender Documents and Attachments

To obtain the tender documents, please visit: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34272/w6399-24-lp73-a-npp.pdf> (English) or <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34272/avis-de-projet-de-marche.pdf> (French).

Note
